name: Pavel Barannikov
summary: Web developer with almost 10 years of experience, specializing in PHP/MySQL, with strong knowledge of jQuery and CSS. Experienced with the 1C-Bitrix, Joomla, WordPress and Drupal ecosystems. Based in Netanya, Israel, with willingness to learn new languages as needed.

experience.title: Web-developer
experience.description: Website development on the 1C-Bitrix platform. Worked with Git; completed 17 projects with medium Git Flow complexity and higher.

experience.title: Seo Web-developer
experience.description: Freelance development; built at least two dozen sites ranging from corporate Docker web applications to highly loaded online stores.

experience.title: Effective Team Leader Web-developer
experience.description: Team-based web application development for internal company needs, corporate site development; system administration.

experience.title: Web-developer, Teamleader
experience.description: Russian website development; management of a development team (3 programmers, 2 layout designers); design, maintenance; interview new staff.
